summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3781 for the improvement of the alley in blocks 5, 8, 17 and 20, Brooklyn Addition, being the alley between 10th Avenue Northeast and 11th Avenue Northeast, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46610, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
